plot outline: Kodambakkam in this movie Sugavannan (Nandha), who is staying in village. Later he settles down in Chennai with the dream of becoming a director one-day. In his native, he falls in love with Dhanam (Diya), she motivates him in all the ways to achieve his dreams.
title: Kodambakkam
plot: _Kodambakkam_ (qv) in this movie Sugavannan (Nandha), who is staying in village. Later he settles down in Chennai with the dream of becoming a director one-day. In his native, he falls in love with Dhanam (Diya), she motivates him in all the ways to achieve his dreams.
